To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of a program to celebrate WSM winning the 1953-54 Variety Show Management Award as the Outstanding Music Station in the US. Personnel include Noel Digby (writer, producer), Bill McElhiney (arranger), Young Harper (arranger), Elmer Alley (engineer), and David Cobb (host). Includes performances by Webb Pierce, Marty Robbins, the Anita Kerr Singers, Buddy Hall, and the WSM Orchestra.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
